title: Bloodless
description: She had warned him over and over that her past was dark, deadly. But never had Gabriel expected to witness that darkness himself. Now after months apart he finds himself back at ‘Dead Fang Hotel’ desperate to save the woman he loves, but not from the enemies she has spent the last decade hiding from… but from herself.Bree never thought she would find someone to love, someone that was worth living for until she met Gabriel. Now finding herself without him and her death drawing ever closer she has fallen into old, dangerous habits. Can Gabriel and her friends save her from her greatest enemy… herself, before it is too late?
author: E.M. Reders
